title: Private Jeep Safari
text: We were a group of three couples in our late 60's and our entire group was very happy with this tour . Starting with Manousakis vineyards where we toured the olive oil factory and winery and tasted many different wines and also their award winning olive oil. we then went off road thru the hills of Crete with many spectacular views (perfect for picture taking ) we then went to a traditional Crete Restaurant where we had a lunch beyond your imagination , from meats to vegetables to everything you could imagine including soft drinks to bottled water to unlimited wine. The restaurant name E TAIAS OE'A THIS TOUR IS A MUST FOR ALL AGES.OUR DRIVER AND GUIDE DIMITRIS WAS VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE AND INFORMATIVE .

title: Very good restaurant in Museum Sq Old Town ,Rhodes Greece
text: We were on a tour in Museum Sq. Rhodes ,Greece and it was about lunch time . We were a group of 3 couples and someone suggested "DINORIS SEAFOOD REST. A very nice elderly man greeted us at the entrance and showed us to our table. We all got menus and had questions about the food . He was able to explain everything about the food which made it very easy to select our choices. All of the people in our group were very pleased with the food and would recommend this Rest. to anyone visiting the area.

title: Our stay at the aempire Palace Hotel
text: We all three couples , were very pleases with our stay in the Empire Palace Hotel Rome . We had just come off a flight from Florida and all were very tired. We arrived at the hotel mid morning and were told check in was early afternoon but they would try their best to get our rooms ready asap .The staff did their best and we were able to go to our rooms early . The rooms were small but nice. The breakfast which was included was very good . Very Pleased with our stay.

title: Trevi Fountain at night .
text: The Trevi Fountain is beautiful at any time of the day but if you get a chance to see it at night it is just spectalar at night

title: a MUST SEE IF YOUR ARE VISITING ROME .
text: I would definitely recommend visiting the Colosseum if you are visiting Rome .This is one of the most spectacular site and a must see

title: Athens trip to the Acropolis .
text: If you like history this is a must see . It was a good distance from our hotel but well worth the trip. Just to see something that was built thousands of years ago an they are still finding more and more on this site. In my eyes it is a must see if you are in this part of the world.

title: Dinner at GODS' RESTAURANT
text: This restaurant was chosen at random one of the nights we were in Athens Greece and we were so pleased with the food and the service we had to go back the second night. We were a group of 6 and they were very busy but were able to accommodate us. We met the two brothers and Momma the owner of the Restautant. GREAT PLACE AND GOOD FOOD

title: Can not beat DRIVER IN ITALY
text: This is the second time we used Driver in Italy and the drivers go out of their way to accommodate all our wishes . We were in Rome two nights and the first night we took the night tour of Rome with Dinner which was great to see the sights at night which looked very different then they look during the day. The next day we took the Vatican Museum and " Best Highlights which was the best of all. CAN NOT BEAT DRIVER IN ITALY SERVICE Thankyou Edoardo and all the staff.

title: Would use this Dats Inn again Loved It
text: This Days Inn was kept very clean and the front desk was very accommodating . The breakfast was more than adequate . My wife and I will definitely stay here again. I could not say anything negative about this Days Inn & Suites Bonita Springs North Naples Fl. It was right off I 75 which made it very easy for me to get to the church and funeral home in down town Naples.
place: Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Bonita Springs North Naples
